sentences.en: At first, he was blissfully unaware of the conspiracy against him.
sentences.cn: 起初，他幸好不知道那些针对他的阴谋。

sentences.en: Chuehhsin gave him a reproachful look, but he was unaware of it.
He stared blankly, as if unaware of what they were doing.
sentences.cn: 呆呆的看着, 他几乎不知那是干什么呢.

sentences.en: He was completely unaware of the whole affair.
sentences.cn: 他对整件事情一无所知。

sentences.en: He was unaware that they had shaken off their pursuers.
sentences.cn: 他不知道他们已经甩掉了追捕者。

sentences.en: I get so absorbed in doing something that I am unaware of things happening round me.
sentences.cn: 我做事太过专心以致于对周围发生的事情丝毫未察觉。

sentences.en: I was quite unaware that Yaming was standing behind me.
sentences.cn: 王亚明站在我的背后,我一点也不知道.

sentences.en: I was unaware of his existence until today.
sentences.cn: 直到今天我才知道有他这么个人。

sentences.en: It may be that you are unaware of where your hip joint is; it is not at the waist but a good hand span below it.
sentences.cn: 这也许是因为你并不晓得髋关节的位置，它不在腰部，而是位于腰部以下一手拃宽处。

sentences.en: Many people are unaware of just how much food and drink they consume.
sentences.cn: 许多人并不知道他们究竟消耗掉了多少食品和饮料。

sentences.en: She was unaware that she was being filmed.
sentences.cn: 她不知道有人在拍摄她。

sentences.en: There may be unrecog-nised cases of manifest injustice of which we are unaware.
sentences.cn: 也许还有一些我们不知道的明显不公平现象被忽视了。

sentences.en: There may be unrecognised cases of manifest injustice of which we are unaware.
sentences.cn: 也许还有一些我们不知道的明显不公平现象被忽视了。

sentences.en: They were unaware of the fate that was to befall them.
sentences.cn: 他们并不知道即将降临到他们头上的厄运。

sentences.en: They were unaware that war was near.
sentences.cn: 他们不知道战争即将爆发.

phrases.tran_cn: 没觉察到，没有意识到；不知道

trans.tran_cn: 不知道的，未察觉到的，未认识到的，不注意的
trans.tran_en: not noticing or realizing what is happening
